p: The effects of the above antimalarial drugs on parasite cells are variable according to the infecting species; however, these drugs may act as hemozoin production inhibitors, folic acid synthesis inhibitors, transcription inhibitors or inhibitors of the mitochondrial respiratory chain, transport proteins inhibitors, and genetic material modifiers (Cunico et al. 2008; Rai et al. 2017).
